name: Gravity Ball
description: Test your reflexes! Gravity Ball is a game where you aim to make the best score. To do this, avoid obstacles on the path of your ball.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphique Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: All
